sourcesContent: import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react' import { Button, Form } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { useMutation } from '@apollo/react-hooks' import { POST_EDIT_MUTATION } from '../query' const PostEdit = (postEditData) => { const [ postEdit, { data } ] = useMutation(POST_EDIT_MUTATION) const titleRef = useRef() const contentRef = useRef() const handleOnSubmit = () => { const id = postEditData.id console.log(postEditData, id) const titleValue = titleRef.current.value const contentValue = contentRef.current.value postEdit({ variables: { id: id, title: titleValue, content: contentValue } }) } return (
